solution_line_template: The total amount of money saved is ${saved_june} + ${saved_july} + ${saved_august} = $<<{saved_june}+{saved_july}+{saved_august}={total_saved}>>{total_saved}.
The total amount spent on books and new shoes is ${spent_books} + ${spent_shoes} = $<<{spent_books}+{spent_shoes}={total_spent}>>{total_spent}.
